plot: Lou, a hockey Pro is dating pop star Erica, and this is his first interaction with the public on the red carpet. Bud has been dying to ask Leslie to marry him. Life has it's many obstacles, if only they were like dreams.
title: A Thousand Times Goodnight
plot_es: Lou, a hockey Pro is dating pop star Erica, and this is his first interaction with the public on the red carpet. Bud has been dying to ask Leslie to marry him. Life has it's many obstacles, if only they were like dreams.
